SA08n990:5: ramaṇīyāni puṇyāni phalaṃ teṣāṃ paraṃ śubham |
SA08n990:6: tasmāt kuruta puṇyāni nāsti puṇyasamaṃ dhanam ||1 ||
SA08n990:9: puṇyaṃ kṛtvā gatā devāḥ puṇyaṃ nayati sadgatim |
SA08n990:10: puṇyaṃ kṛtvā narā loke modante tridive hi (te) ||3 ||
SA08n990:12: puṇyādhikā hi puruṣā bhavanti sukhinaḥ sadā |
SA08n990:13: tasmāt kuruta puṇyāni nāsti puṇyasamaṃ sukham ||4 ||
SA08n990:14: puṇyaṃ kṛtvā gatā devāḥ puṇyapriyadhanasya ca |
SA08n990:15: hetubhūtaṃ sadā dṛṣṭaṃ tasmāt puṇyaṃ paraṃ sukham ||5 ||
SA08n990:18: tasmāt sukhaṃ paraṃ puṇyaṃ nāsti puṇyādṛte sukham ||6 ||
SA08n990:24: kutasteṣāṃ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ sikatāsu yathā ghṛtam ||8 ||
SA08n990:26: na teṣāṃ vidyate śarma duḥkhaṃ teṣāmanuttaram ||9 ||
SA08n990:28: mānuṣyaṃ sukṛtaṃ hyetat kṛte bhavati dehinaḥ |
SA08n990:30: priyo bhavati yasyātmā yasya saukhye sthitā matiḥ |
SA08n990:38: puṇyakārī sadā dānto padaṃ gacchati cāvyayam |
SA08n990:41: vicitraṃ hi kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ vicitraṃ paripacyate |
SA08n990:45: yo (hi) dharma parityajya ramate kukṛte naraḥ |
SA08n990:51: yo hi deśayate dharma pareṣāṃ hitakāṅkṣayā |
SA08n990:52: sa mātā sa pitā caiva nirvāṇapuradeśakaḥ ||17 ||
SA08n990:56: na mūlyaṃ vidyate śāstuḥ subhāṣitapadasya vai ||18 ||
SA08n990:58: na padaṃ labhate śāntaṃ yad dhanairupalabhyate |
SA08n990:59: dravyaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na dharmo buddhibandhanam ||19 ||
SA08n990:61: dravyaṃ vinaśyati nṛṇāṃ dharmadravyaṃ na jātu vai |
SA08n990:69: dharma ekaḥ paraṃ trāṇaṃ dharma ekaḥ parā gatiḥ |
SA08n990:76: sa tadā duḥkhamāpnoti narakeṣu punaḥ punaḥ ||25 ||
SA08n990:85: puṇyaprabhāvo vipulo yasya śīle rataṃ manaḥ ||28 ||
SA08n990:88: dharmo hi nayati svarga dharmacārī sukhānvitaḥ ||29 ||
SA08n990:93: śreyo bhaveddhi maraṇaṃ na tu dharmavigarhaṇam |
SA08n990:94: dharmeṇa varjito lokaḥ saṃsāre sarvadā bhramet ||31 ||
SA08n990:97: vṛthā saukhyamidaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāto yathā'paraḥ ||32 ||
SA08n990:101: prayānti tat padaṃ śāntaṃ yatra duḥkhaṃ na vidyate ||34 ||
SA08n990:103: indriyāṇāṃ vaśe yastu viṣayeṣu tathaiva ca |
SA08n990:109: buddho yeṣāṃ bahumato nityaṃ dharmaśca gocaraḥ |
SA08n990:117: udyogānāṃ sadā dhyānaṃ yena gacchati nirvṛtim ||40 ||
SA08n990:123: mātā pitṛsamaḥ pūjya upādhyāyaḥ sadā bhavet |
SA08n990:126: agrāhyā vā sadā dṛṣṭā muninā tattvadarśinā |
SA08n990:127: sukhasya bhūmayo hyetā niḥsukhā viṣayā matāḥ ||44 ||
SA08n990:129: saukhyaṃ tasya bhavennityaṃ na saukhyaṃ devabhūmiṣu ||45 ||
SA08n990:131: sa āhūya prayatnena sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ ||46 ||
SA08n990:132: anāgate bhayaṃ yo hi paśyati buddhacakṣuṣā |
SA08n990:136: sa hi vighne tu samprāpte na viṣādena bādhyate ||48 ||
SA08n990:140: yāvat samagraṃ janmedaṃ jñānaṃ yāti vināvilam |
SA08n990:142: kṣayaṃ prayānti puṇyāni tvaritaṃ yāti jīvitam |
SA08n990:144: yo hi dharma parityajya pramādopahato naraḥ |
SA08n990:145: na sañcinoti puṇyāni sa paścādapi tapyate ||52 ||
SA08n990:146: na yāvadāyāti jarā na vyādhiḥ saha mṛtyunā |
SA08n990:147: tāvat kāryāṇi puṇyāni mā paścāt paritapyatha ||53 ||
SA08n990:150: kiṃ tasya jīvitenārthaḥ kiṃ bhāgyaiḥ kiṃ ca bāndhavaiḥ |
SA08n990:151: sabalendriyatāṃ prāpya yo na dharmarataḥ sadā ||55 ||
SA08n990:153: viratiścāpi pāpebhyaḥ sādhūnāṃ darśane na ca ||56 ||
SA08n990:154: śīlena yaḥ suro janma labdhvedaṃ kāmamohitaḥ |
SA08n990:155: na sañcinoti puṇyāni sa bhavaṃ nātivartate ||57 ||
SA08n990:159: devāste hi sadā vandyā ye dharme niratāḥ sadā |
SA08n990:160: ye tu nityaṃ bhavāsaktāste sarve nidhanaṃ gatāḥ ||59 ||
SA08n990:167: saṅgṛhītaṃ sadā śīlaṃ jñānaṃ ca parivartitam |
SA08n990:171: tasmād doṣān parityajya guṇāḥ sevyāḥ prayatnataḥ ||63 ||
SA08n990:176: prāpya janmāntara cāpi nirvṛtiṃ cāśu gacchati ||65 ||
